data.name: Crazy Chicken Xtreme
data.detailed_description:
bang! Poom Poom! Blam! Boom!


Hunt mischievous moorhuhns across a mystical campsite in the forest, shoot them down in the old walls of a knight's castle, or put your marksmanship to the test in a medieval marketplace.
If a wild chicken gets in the line of fire, blast it with a shotgun, rocket launcher, or chicken-hammer. Quickly load up on ammunition to enjoy maximum shooting action, and the chickens will either have to drop their feathers or end up roasting on the spit!

  • 3 exciting locations
  • 3 deadly weapons
  • Atmospheric settings
  • Offline multiplayer mode (1 vs 1, up to 4 players take turns in the hot seat)
  • Online high score

data.short_description: Hunt mischievous moorhuhns across a mystical campsite in the forest, shoot them down in the old walls of a knight's castle, or put your marksmanship to the test in a medieval marketplace.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Dutch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Moorhuhn Xtreme Â© 2022 Markt+Technik Verlag GmbH. Developed by Korion Interactive GmbH. Published by Markt+Technik GmbH. Moorhuhn & Crazy Chicken are registered trademarks of ak tronic Software & Services GmbH. The Moorhuhn character is based on a graphical work of Ingo Mesche from the year 1998.

content_descriptors.notes: First-person shooter in which players shoot fantastical chicken characters.. This game features mild violence that lacks any apparent harm or injury to fantasy creatures.
